workflow.name: Landing Page Analysis & Optimization with Claude's 4-Agent AI System
workflow.description:
# üéØ AI Landing Page Analyzer & Optimizer

Transform your landing page audits into a powerful lead generation machine with this professional n8n workflow powered by 4 specialized AI agents.

## What It Does

This workflow analyzes any landing page and delivers a comprehensive, $2,000-value audit report in under 90 seconds. Perfect for agencies, consultants, and SaaS companies looking to generate high-quality leads while showcasing their expertise.

## ü§ñ Four Specialized AI Agents

1. **Design Critic** - Analyzes UX/UI, visual hierarchy, CTA placement, mobile responsiveness, and trust signals
2. **Copywriter** - Reviews messaging, headlines, value propositions, and emotional triggers
3. **SEO Specialist** - Audits technical SEO, meta tags, heading structure, and performance indicators
4. **Growth Strategist** - Synthesizes all findings, assigns an A-F grade, and creates prioritized action plans

## ‚ú® Key Features

- **Comprehensive Scoring**: 6-dimension scorecard with detailed justifications
- **Actionable Insights**: Top 5 priorities ranked by impact vs. effort
- **Conversion Lift Estimates**: Conservative, realistic, and optimistic projections
- **Beautiful HTML Reports**: Professional email with all analyses, branded for your business
- **Natural Upsell Path**: Built-in CTA for paid optimization services
- **Fast Delivery**: Complete analysis in 60-90 seconds

## üìä What Gets Analyzed

### Design & UX
- Visual hierarchy and layout structure
- CTA design, placement, and effectiveness
- Color scheme and whitespace usage
- Trust signals and social proof
- Mobile responsiveness indicators

### Copywriting
- Headline impact and hook effectiveness
- Value proposition clarity
- Benefits vs. features balance
- Emotional triggers and persuasion
- CTA copy strength and action orientation

### SEO & Technical
- Title tag and meta description optimization
- Heading structure (H1, H2 hierarchy)
- Image optimization and alt tags
- Mobile-friendliness
- Analytics tracking setup
- Page speed indicators

### Strategic Overview
- Overall grade (A+ to F) with detailed explanation
- Comprehensive scorecard across all dimensions
- Prioritized action items by ROI
- Estimated conversion lift potential
- Strategic recommendations and next steps

## üíº Perfect For

- **Digital Marketing Agencies**: Offer free audits to generate leads
- **Freelance Consultants**: Showcase expertise and attract clients
- **SaaS Companies**: Lead magnet for conversion optimization tools
- **Web Development Agencies**: Pre-sales qualification and demonstrations
- **CRO Specialists**: Automated initial assessments

## üìã What You Need

### Required
- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)
- Anthropic API key (Claude Sonnet 4.5)
- Gmail account for sending reports (or any SMTP provider)

### Optional Enhancements
- Screenshot API (UrlBox, Puppeteer) for visual captures
- Google PageSpeed Insights API for performance testing
- CRM integration (HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive)
- Slack notifications for lead alerts
- Calendar booking integration (Calendly)

## ‚öôÔ∏è Technical Details

- **AI Model**: Claude Sonnet 4.5 (4 separate agents)
- **Average Runtime**: 60-90 seconds
- **Cost Per Analysis**: ~$0.15-0.25 (API costs)
- **Form Fields**: 6 (landing page URL, industry, goal, conversion rate, frustration, email)
- **Output**: Beautiful HTML email report with comprehensive analysis

## üé® Customization Options

The workflow includes detailed documentation and is fully customizable:

- Adjust agent prompts for your specific niche
- Modify scoring criteria and thresholds
- Customize email branding and design
- Add/remove form fields
- Integrate with your CRM
- Segment responses by score (different CTAs for different grades)

## üìà Expected Results

- **Lead Quality**: High (users actively seeking optimization)
- **Conversion Rate**: 15-30% of audit recipients book calls
- **Time Saved**: 2-3 hours of manual analysis per audit
- **Perceived Value**: $2,000+ professional audit

## üîß Setup Difficulty

**Intermediate** - Requires basic n8n knowledge and API key setup

### Setup Steps
1. Import workflow to n8n
2. Add Anthropic API credentials
3. Configure Gmail/SMTP credentials
4. Customize form and email branding
5. Test with sample landing page
6. Deploy form on your website

## üìö Included Documentation

- Comprehensive sticky notes explaining each component
- Setup instructions and prerequisites
- Customization guide
- Monetization strategy breakdown
- Performance optimization tips
- Enhancement ideas for v2

## üåü Use Cases

1. **Lead Magnet**: Embed form on your website to capture qualified leads
2. **Sales Tool**: Use during discovery calls to demonstrate value
3. **Content Marketing**: Offer audits in LinkedIn posts, email campaigns
4. **Partner Program**: Provide white-labeled audits to partners
5. **Upsell Sequence**: Follow up with paid optimization services

## ‚ö° Why This Workflow?

Unlike simple template-based audits, this workflow uses **real AI intelligence** to provide nuanced, contextual insights. Each analysis is unique and considers:

- Industry-specific best practices
- Stated business goals
- Current pain points
- Competitive landscape
- User's experience level

The result? Reports that feel hand-crafted by experts, not generic checklists.

## ü§ù Support

üìñ Website: https://evervise.ai/
‚ú® Support: mark.marin@evervise.com

[N8N Link](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/ds9podzjls6d)

## üìä Version History

- **v1.0** - Initial release with 4-agent analysis pipeline
- Coming soon: Screenshot capture, competitor comparison, visual mockups

## Tags

`lead-generation` `marketing-automation` `ai-agents` `conversion-optimization` `landing-pages` `anthropic` `claude` `audit` `seo` `copywriting` `design-analysis` `lead-magnet`

---

**Ready to turn landing page audits into a lead generation machine?** Import this workflow and start attracting high-quality clients today.

parameters.formDescription: Get a $2,000 professional landing page audit in 90 seconds. Powered by 4 AI specialists who analyze design, copy, SEO, and conversion strategy.

options.systemMessage:
You are a senior UX/UI designer and conversion optimization expert with 15+ years experience analyzing landing pages.

You evaluate pages based on:
- Visual hierarchy (F-pattern, Z-pattern)
- CTA prominence and clarity
- Color psychology for the industry
- Trust indicators and social proof placement
- Mobile-first design principles
- Whitespace and breathing room
- Professional polish vs. amateur mistakes

Output your analysis in this structure:

üìä DESIGN SCORES (0-10 each):
- Visual Hierarchy: X/10
- CTA Design: X/10  
- Mobile Responsiveness: X/10
- Trust Signals: X/10
- Professional Polish: X/10

üé® KEY FINDINGS:
[3-5 bullet points of main design issues or strengths]

üî• CRITICAL DESIGN FLAWS:
[List any deal-breaker design problems]

‚ú® QUICK WINS:
[3-5 easy design improvements that would have immediate impact]

üí° ADVANCED RECOMMENDATIONS:
[Bigger picture design strategy suggestions]

Be specific, honest, and constructive. Reference actual elements from the page data provided.

You are a world-class copywriter and conversion expert specializing in landing pages.

You evaluate copy based on:
- Headline formulas (curiosity, benefit, urgency)
- Value proposition clarity (can a 5-year-old understand it?)
- Benefits-focused language vs. feature-dumping
- Emotional triggers (fear, desire, curiosity, belonging)
- CTA psychology (action-oriented, value-driven)
- Readability (Flesch score, sentence length)
- Voice & tone match to audience
- Objection handling

Output your analysis in this structure:

üìä COPY SCORES (0-10 each):
- Headline Impact: X/10
- Value Proposition Clarity: X/10
- Benefit Focus: X/10
- CTA Effectiveness: X/10
- Overall Persuasiveness: X/10

‚úçÔ∏è KEY FINDINGS:
[3-5 bullet points of main copy issues or strengths]

üö® CRITICAL COPY PROBLEMS:
[List any messaging deal-breakers]

‚ö° QUICK COPY FIXES:
[3-5 easy rewrites that would boost conversions]

üéØ REWRITE SUGGESTIONS:
[Provide specific headline and CTA alternatives]

üí¨ MESSAGING STRATEGY:
[Overall approach to improve persuasion]

Be specific and provide actual rewrite examples. Reference the goal and industry context.

You are a technical SEO expert and web performance specialist.

You evaluate pages based on:
- On-page SEO fundamentals
- Title tag best practices (50-60 chars, keyword placement)
- Meta description optimization (150-160 chars)
- Proper heading hierarchy
- Image optimization (alt tags, lazy loading)
- Mobile-first indexing requirements
- Core Web Vitals
- Analytics and tracking setup
- Accessibility standards

Output your analysis in this structure:

üìä SEO & TECHNICAL SCORES (0-10 each):
- Title Tag Optimization: X/10
- Meta Description: X/10
- Heading Structure: X/10
- Image Optimization: X/10
- Mobile Readiness: X/10
- Technical Health: X/10

üîç KEY FINDINGS:
[3-5 bullet points of main SEO/technical issues]

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL SEO ISSUES:
[List any red flags that hurt rankings]

‚ö° QUICK TECHNICAL WINS:
[3-5 easy fixes for immediate SEO improvement]

üõ†Ô∏è TECHNICAL RECOMMENDATIONS:
[Deeper technical improvements]

üìà SEO STRATEGY:
[Overall approach to improve search visibility]

Be specific and actionable. Provide exact character counts for meta elements.

You are a growth strategist and conversion rate optimization (CRO) expert who synthesizes design, copy, and technical insights into actionable business strategy.

Your job is to:
- Assign an overall grade (A+ to F) based on all agent feedback
- Prioritize improvements by ROI (impact vs. effort)
- Estimate realistic conversion lift potential
- Provide strategic, business-focused recommendations
- Create a balanced scorecard

Output your analysis in this EXACT structure:

üéØ OVERALL LANDING PAGE GRADE
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
Grade: [A+, A, A-, B+, B, B-, C+, C, C-, D, F]
Score: X/100

[2-3 sentence explanation of the grade]

üìä COMPREHENSIVE SCORECARD
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

Design & UX: X/10
[Brief justification]

Copywriting & Messaging: X/10
[Brief justification]

SEO & Technical: X/10
[Brief justification]

Conversion Potential: X/10
[Brief justification]

Mobile Experience: X/10
[Brief justification]

Trust & Credibility: X/10
[Brief justification]

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üî• TOP 5 PRIORITIES (Ranked by Impact)
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

1. [Priority 1]
   Impact: [High/Medium/Low] | Effort: [Easy/Medium/Hard]
   Expected Lift: X-Y%
   [Why this matters]

2. [Priority 2]
   Impact: [High/Medium/Low] | Effort: [Easy/Medium/Hard]
   Expected Lift: X-Y%
   [Why this matters]

[... continue for all 5]

üìà CONVERSION LIFT POTENTIAL
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

Conservative Estimate: +X%
Realistic Target: +Y%
Optimistic Scenario: +Z%

[2-3 sentences explaining the basis for these estimates]

üí™ KEY STRENGTHS
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
‚Ä¢ [Strength 1]
‚Ä¢ [Strength 2]
‚Ä¢ [Strength 3]

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL WEAKNESSES
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
‚Ä¢ [Weakness 1]
‚Ä¢ [Weakness 2]
‚Ä¢ [Weakness 3]

üöÄ STRATEGIC RECOMMENDATIONS
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

[3-5 paragraphs of strategic, high-level recommendations that tie everything together]

üí° NEXT STEPS
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
1. [Immediate action item]
2. [Short-term improvement]
3. [Long-term strategy]

Be honest but motivating. Focus on business outcomes, not just metrics.

parameters.content:
## üìã WORKFLOW OVERVIEW
**AI Landing Page Analyzer & Optimizer**

‚è±Ô∏è **Performance:**
- Avg completion: 60-90 seconds
- 4 AI agents working in parallel
- Cost per analysis: ~$0.15-0.25

üéØ **Conversion Funnel:**
- Free: Full audit report
- Paid Tier 1 ($297): We fix it
- Paid Tier 2 ($997): Fix + A/B testing
- Enterprise: Full optimization program

üí° **Optimization Ideas:**
- Add screenshot capture (UrlBox API)
- Generate visual mockups (v2)
- A/B test different email formats
- Track which recommendations get implemented

## üìù FORM INTAKE
**User submits landing page for audit**

‚ú® **Customization Options:**
- Add company size field
- Add budget/pricing tier selector
- Require phone for high-intent leads
- Add "How did you hear about us?"

üé® **Design Tips:**
- Keep it simple (6 fields max)
- Use dropdown for goal (reduces friction)
- Make conversion rate optional
- Email is the only hard requirement

## üåê WEB SCRAPING
**Extracts page content for analysis**

‚öôÔ∏è **What It Does:**
- Fetches HTML of landing page
- Extracts headings, CTAs, forms
- Counts images and checks alt tags
- Detects mobile viewport
- Identifies frameworks/tools

üí° **Enhancement Ideas:**
- Add screenshot capture (UrlBox/Puppeteer)
- Extract CSS for color analysis
- Check page load speed
- Scan for broken links
- Use Apify Crawler or Crawl4AI(also provided below) - You can use raw output for those

## ü§ñ AGENT 1: Design Critic
**UX/UI analysis expert**

üé® **Focus Areas:**
- Visual hierarchy
- CTA placement & design
- Whitespace usage
- Trust signals
- Mobile responsiveness

‚öôÔ∏è **Model Settings:**
- Temperature: 0.4 (balanced)
- Creative but consistent

üìä **Output:**
- 5 design scores (0-10)
- Critical flaws
- Quick wins
- Advanced recommendations

## ü§ñ AGENT 2: Copywriter
**Messaging & persuasion expert**

‚úçÔ∏è **Focus Areas:**
- Headline effectiveness
- Value proposition clarity
- Benefits vs features
- CTA copy strength
- Emotional triggers

‚öôÔ∏è **Model Settings:**
- Temperature: 0.5 (creative)
- Great for copy ideas

üìä **Output:**
- 5 copy scores (0-10)
- Rewrite suggestions
- Specific alternatives
- Messaging strategy

## ü§ñ AGENT 3: SEO Specialist
**Technical & search optimization**

üîç **Focus Areas:**
- Title tag optimization
- Meta description
- Heading structure
- Image optimization
- Mobile-friendliness
- Analytics tracking

‚öôÔ∏è **Model Settings:**
- Temperature: 0.3 (precise)
- Technical accuracy critical

üìä **Output:**
- 6 technical scores (0-10)
- Critical SEO issues
- Quick technical wins
- SEO strategy

## ü§ñ AGENT 4: Growth Strategist
**Synthesis & strategic recommendations**

üöÄ **Responsibilities:**
- Assign overall grade (A-F)
- Create comprehensive scorecard
- Rank top 5 priorities
- Estimate conversion lift
- Strategic recommendations

‚öôÔ∏è **Model Settings:**
- Temperature: 0.6 (strategic thinking)
- Balances all inputs

üìä **Output:**
- Overall grade & score (/100)
- 6-dimension scorecard
- Prioritized action items
- Conversion lift estimates
- Strategic roadmap

## üìß EMAIL DELIVERY
**Beautiful HTML report**

üé® **Email Includes:**
- Grade banner with score
- All 4 agent analyses
- Comprehensive scorecard
- Page statistics
- Clear CTA to paid services

üí° **Customization:**
- Add calendar booking link
- Segment by score (A/B get different CTA)
- Include video explanation
- Add social proof

üìä **Track:**
- Email open rate
- CTA click rate
- Conversion to paid

## üöÄ Built by Evervise

**Automating the repetitive so you can focus on what matters**

### Need Help?
üìß **Support**: mark.marin@evervise.com
üåê **Website**: [evervise.ai](https://evervise.ai)  
üí¨ **Response Time**: Usually within 24 hours
**License**: Customize freely for your needs

*Questions about customization? We've been there. Reach out.*
